[React] Event planning app

Oct 19, 2019

EVNT is an event planning app made in react native

Users can:

  • create an account
  • sign in
  • see events
  • see other users who are going to events

EVNT features:

  • dynamic animations
  • firebase integration
  • contemporary layout
  • responsive UI
